main.name: Mohamed EL Sayed
main.description: Freelancer web developer with more than 1 year of experience with production-level projects and interacting with international clients.
main.bio: Resourceful and dedicated junior Front-end Web developer with excellent analytical skills and a demonstrated commitment to providing great customer service. Strong organizational abilities with proven successes managing multiple academic projects and volunteering events. Well-rounded and professional team player dedicated to continuing academic pursuits at a collegiate level.Experienced Web Developer adept in all stages of advanced web development. Knowledgeable in user interface, testing, and debugging processes. Bringing forth expertise in design, installation, testing and maintenance of web systems.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: Mohamed has been a very hard working and dependable consultant. He understands the business requirements and goes extra mile to deliver it. Highly professional and great value add to any team.
testimonials.user: Dr: Shaimaa / a proffesser in computer science

testimonials.text: I had worked with Mohamed  for more than 1 year, I was senior to him. I had the pleasure of working with him. His dedication toward his work was outstanding and he always had positive attitude toward new learning. He is dedicated, self-motivated, trustworthy, independent and very capable. Nitish would be an asset to any Company.
testimonials.user: Eng: Ezz el din / A Full-Stack Developer
